abstract: lala kent 's married man officially divorced .
article: lala kent 's married man is finally divorced . randall emmett and ambyr childers settled their divorce and were pronounced single on december 22 , per a los angeles county court docket . the terms of their separation and the custody agreement over their young daughters , london and rylee , remains confidential . `` it was an amicable divorce , '' emmett 's rep told page six on wednesday . `` they have a healthy co-parenting relationship for their children . '' the `` power '' producer , 46 , first filed for separation from childers , 29 , in april 2015 , but he asked the court to dismiss his petition in may 2016 .

childers filed for divorce in january 2017 after kent , 27 , was accused of having an affair with an unnamed married man on `` vanderpump rules . '' the #givethemlala beauty queen first appeared on season 4 of the bravo hit show and came under fire for her love life during season 5 . she quit the show midway through the season over her castmates ' claims that her over-the-top lifestyle was paid for by her then-anonymous boyfriend , but finally confessed that her range rover was paid for by someone else and the lies she made about her relationship gave her anxiety when she returned for season 6 .

kent only mentioned emmett 's name while asking a casino worker where he was in a now-deleted instagram story from las vegas , but page six caught the couple kissing at an event in beverly hills earlier this month . childers ' rep did not immediately return our request for comment . kent 's rep did n't get back to us .
